product_name: Columbia Reel Beauty Print Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Sweeping lines and a cowl-inspired slouchy hood make the versatile, wicking and UPF-armed Columbia Reel Beauty Print Top as stylish as it is comfortable and functional. Polyester/spandex fabric offers comfy stretch for easy on/off and shape retention. UPF 15 sun protection and a hood help keep harmful UV rays at bay. Omni-Wick(R) technology actively breathes and pulls sweat away from the skin so you stay comfortable. Antimicrobial treatment protects the women's Columbia Reel Beauty Print Top from odor. Closeout.
short_description: Sweeping lines and a cowl-inspired slouchy hood make the versatile, wicking and UPF-armed Columbia Reel Beauty Print Top as stylish as it is comfortable and functional.
